board_X_topics: {count, plural, =0 {No topics} one {# topic} other {# topics}}
board_no_topics: There are no topics in this group yet.
board_topic_info: {posts, plural, one {# post} other {# posts}}. Last by {authorName}, {date}
board_topic_summary: There {count, plural, one {is # post} other {are # posts}} in this topic
board_topic_list_summary: There {count, plural, =0 {are no topics} one {is # topic} other {are # topics}} in this group
board_topic_list_summary_event: There {count, plural, =0 {are no topics} one {is # topic} other {are # topics}} in this event
board_delete_topic_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this topic?
board_topic_deleted_subtitle: The topic has been removed from the group's discussion board.
board_topic_pinned_subtitle: This topic will now always appear at the top of the discussion board.
board_topic_unpinned_subtitle: This topic will no longer appear at the top of the discussion board.
board_topic_locked_subtitle: Community members will no longer be able to post in this topic.
board_topic_unlocked_subtitle: All community members will now be able to post in this topic.
